title: A Secret place
creator_credit: Susan Jones, Kim Cardow, Nicholas Oughton and College of Art
brief_description: Shows the outdoor play environment at the Lady Gowrie Child Centre in Brisbane where children can take advantage of conditions not always available. Tree-houses, streams, mud pools and a variety of animals combine to make this natural environment. Shows how children can interact with even the simplest part of this environment.
